schema.description: Returns a string formatted as specified in RFC 8288 with pagination information ONLY if there was at least 1 item found. Always has a rel: first and last, and may provide a link to next and/or previous
Returns a number indicating the total number of items found

post.summary: Removes the refresh token and instructs the client to invalidate the JWT cookies

get.summary: List all the appointments of the logged user
List all provinces of a given country
List all localities of a given province
If it is a doctor, then it lists all its workdays, if it is not, then it returns 403

post.summary: Creates a workday or a collection of them

get.summary: List all appointment time slots for a given doctor
